name: Omnitags
author: Optima Lab

sections.description: Omnitags simplifies the insertion of scripts and meta data in the source code, such as SEO meta data, analytics scripts, comments and live chat services, CRM tracking, marketing automation, widgets, …
sections.installation:
Upload the Omnitags plugin to your WordPress website, activate it, open the Omnitags admin menu, then enter values for the services your need to include in your website.
For any problem or inquiries, contact us : johannfrot@gmail.com
sections.changelog:
1.0

Release Date: December 27th, 2017
* First release

1.1

Release Date: August 22nd, 2019
* Added comments to generated source code
* Tested up to version 5.2.2

1.2

Release Date: August 22nd, 2019
* Added translation strings
